heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T doesn't take associates with no spine. "I pity da foo got no spine".
heisig_constituent: partner, person, spine, mouth, drop, mouth, mouth2
koohiiStory1: Mr. T don´t take a partner, especially one with no spine. "I pity da foo got no spine", he says.
koohiiStory2: As a PARTNER, I want a PERSON with a strong SPINE.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 友 (とも、ユウ друг), 供 (そなえる、とも、キョウ преподносить, жертвовать, товарищ), 共 (とも、キョウ вместе, совместно), 倶 (ともに、グ вместе), 呂 (せぼね、ロ ванна). Употребляется реже.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) with the spine (呂) is your companion
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T makes sure he keeps a chiropracter as an associate so he can make sure his spine is adjusted and ready for a long day of work.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " Lu ", it means companion and partner. "Shuowen Xinfu": "A disciple. Congren, Lu Sheng." Han Wang Bao's "Four Sons Talking about Virtue": "So we meet and couple together and travel hand in hand."

" Companion " said partnering, companionship. Jin Gehong's "Baopuzi·Chen Fei": "However, foolishness means good and evil. It violates the true and false. It does not change its course. The collection of no harm is not to fall from the sky."

" Lu " also refers to a monk, or a Buddhist monk. "Family Instructions of the Yan Clan: Returning to the Heart" of the Northern Qi Yan: "If you are a minister who is in trouble, he still asks for a position; how can he provide for a couple who destroys the forbidden?"
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " Lu ", it means companion and partner.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「呂」聲，表示同伴、伴侶。《說文新附》：「徒侶也。从人，呂聲。」 漢王褒〈四子講德論〉：「於是相與結侶，攜手俱遊。」

　　「侶」也表示結為伴侶、陪伴。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧臣節》：「然而愚瞽捨正即邪，違真侶偽，親覽傾僨，不改其軌，無禍之集，非降自天也。」

　　「侶」還表示僧侶，出家修行的佛教徒。北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧歸心》：「且闕行之臣，猶求祿位；毀禁之侶，何慚供養乎？」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「呂」聲，表示同伴、伴侶。

從「 人 」，「 呂 」聲，表示同伴、伴侶。《說文新附》：「徒侶也。从人，呂聲。」 漢王褒〈四子講德論〉：「於是相與結侶，攜手俱遊。」 「 侶 」也表示結為伴侶、陪伴。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧臣節》：「然而愚瞽捨正即邪，違真侶偽，親覽傾僨，不改其軌，無禍之集，非降自天也。」 「 侶 」還表示僧侶，出家修行的佛教徒。北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧歸心》：「且闕行之臣，猶求祿位；毀禁之侶，何慚供養乎？」
From the sound of " person" and " Lu", it means companion and partner. "Shuowen Xinfu": "A disciple. Congren, Lu Sheng." Han Wang Bao's "Four Sons Talking about Virtue": "So we meet and couple together and travel hand in hand." " Companion" said partnering, companionship. Jin Gehong's "Baopuzi·Chen Fei": "However, foolishness means good and evil. It violates the true and false. It does not change its course. The collection of no harm is not to fall from the sky." " Lu" also refers to a monk, or a Buddhist monk. "Family Instructions of the Yan Clan: Returning to the Heart" of the Northern Qi Yan: "If you are a minister who is in trouble, he still asks for a position; how can he provide for a couple who destroys the forbidden?"

侶字的基本解释

侶
lǚ
同“侣”。

侶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bù］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)无，没有。
(2)非，不是。
(3)不到，未。
(4)副词。表否定。
(5)副词。表禁止。勿，不要。
(6)副词。单用，做否定性的回答。
(7)副词。方言。用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等。
(8)副词。用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果。
(9)副词。“不”字的前后叠用相同的名词，表示不在乎或不相干。
(10)副词。跟“便”“就”搭用，表示选择。
(11)副词。方言。不用；不要（限用于某些套语）。
(12)助词。无义。用以足句或加强语气。
(13)助词。无义。表示反问语气。
(14)通“丕”。大。
[②]［fǒu］
［《廣韻》方久切，上有，非。］
同“否1”。
[③]［fōu］
［《廣韻》甫鳩切，平尤，非。］
姓。汉有不疑。见《後汉书·皇甫规传》。
[④]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
花蒂。
[⑤]［pǐ］
［《韻补》補美切，上紙］
通“否2”。<

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bù］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) No, no.
(2) No, no.
(3) No, no.
(4) Adverbs. Table negation.
(5) Adverbs. Table prohibited. Don't, don't.
(6) Adverbs. Use it alone to make a negative answer.
(7) Adverbs. dialect. Used at the end of a sentence to express a question, it is equivalent to a repeated question.
(8) Adverbs. Used in the middle of the dynamic compensation structure, it means that it is impossible to achieve a certain result.
(9) Adverbs. The same nouns are used before and after the word "bu", which means that they don't care or are irrelevant.
(10) Adverbs. Used with "convenience" and "just" to indicate choice.
(11) Adverbs. dialect. No; don't (limited to certain phrases).
(12) Particles. Meaningless. Use full sentences or to strengthen the tone.
(13) Particles. Meaningless. Indicates a rhetorical tone.
(14) Link "Pi". Big.
[②]［fǒu］
["Guangyun" Fang Jiu cut, there is no. ]
Same as "No 1".
[③] [fōu]
["Guangyun" Fu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Fei. ]
name. Han has no doubts. See "Book of the Later Han·Huangfu Rules Biography".
[④]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
Flower pedicle.
[⑤] [pǐ]
["Yunbu" to make up the beauty and cut, put on paper]
Pass "No 2".
